title: Irwin Naturals CBD + Brain Awake | The Healthy Place
description: Keep Your Brain Active And Alert! Buy Irwin Naturals CBD Plus Brain Awake, A Balanced Formula Designed To Support Brain Function And Memory.
cleaned_text: Full Price 3 in stock 60 Liquid Soft-Gels Keep your brain active and alert with Irwin Naturals CBD Plus Brain Awake, a balanced formula designed to support brain function and memory.* - Enhances cognitive function and performance* - Supports mental focus and clarity* - Boosts memory, recall, and retention* - No preservatives added Irwin Naturals CBD + Brain Awake Struggling to think of your next big idea? Wish you could focus on your tasks? Having trouble recalling every single important detail? Sometimes it's difficult just to think of the right word to say. It's a feeling we all probably know too well! There's no need to worry any longer. Fuel your brain with Irwin Naturals CBD Plus Brain Awake! In fact, we think that Irwin Naturals CBD Plus Brain Awake will be your new favorite [brain and memory supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/health-concerns/brain-health-supplements/)! With CBD extracted from full spectrum hemp, plus a variety of brain-supporting nutrients and botanicals, your mind can stay sharp and smart all day long!* - CBD: CBD is known for its relaxing effects. In this case, the CBD in CBD Brain Awake is meant to quiet your mind and improve your focus. After all, the first step when you're faced with a new challenge is usually to just take a deep breath and calm down. Our mind works best when it's in a relaxed state, and so, CBD is here to help! Plus, since this CBD is extracted from full spectrum hemp, its effects are far more potent than your average CBD isolate.* - L-Theanine: L-theanine, an amino acid, is naturally found in some variations of green and black tea. It's known to enhance our mental attention, clarity, and performance.* - Ginkgo: Just like the long-lived tree that it comes from, ginkgo extract can improve our memory, retention, and focus!* - B vitamins: The most plentiful of essential vitamins, B vitamins play a variety of important roles in our body, such as helping our brain to function properly and delivering nutrients to the right places.* - Caffeine: And of course, some caffeine (naturally taken from green coffee beans) ties this whole [brain and memory supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/health-concerns/brain-health-supplements/)together by amplifying our alertness and truly keeping our brain awake!* Buy Irwin Naturals CBD Plus Brain Awake to help your mind flourish — the best CBD for brain health!* Have a question about Irwin Naturals CBD Brain Awake, or any of our other [CBD softgels](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/cbd-products/cbd-softgels-and-capsules/)? Our certified Wellness Consultants are here to help! Click on the LiveChat button to start a conversation today! Suggested Use: (Adult) take three (3) Liquid Soft-Gels daily with a meal and a full glass (8oz) of water. If caffeine keeps you up at night, do not take this product in the evening since it contains natural caffeine. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. This product contains ingredients that may affect blood pressure, heart disease, and/or blood sugar. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are taking any medications, including anti-coagulants (blood-thinners), or have any medical conditions, including heart disease or high/low blood pressure. It is recommended to limit additional caffeine intake while taking this product. Do not use if you may become pregnant, are pregnant, or nursing. Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Not intended for use for persons under 18. Questions? We've got answers! The mission is simple: heal the world with plant medicine. In 1994, Klee Irwin had a vision to accomplish that mission, so he founded Irwin Naturals. Instead of funneling his money into marketing or advertising, he decided to invest his sparse savings into potent supplements. The result? Over the decades, customers noticed that spending their money on these incredible supplements had a profound impact on their health! What started as a small following has expanded to millions of loyal fans, allowing Klee to accomplish his mission one person at a time through the power of plants. Plants are naturally rich in vitamins, minerals, and botanical ingredients that contribute to a healthy diet and lifestyle. No matter your health conditions, Irwin Naturals trusts that plants can heal and revitalize your mind and body! Since the 1990s, Irwin Naturals continues to produce high-quality supplements that are affordable, absorbable, and potent. But here's what really sets them apart from the competition: all of their products are in the form of liquid soft gels! Traditional tablets and capsules sometimes include filler ingredients and are often difficult for our bodies to absorb. That's not the case with Irwin Naturals soft gels! Each one contains BioPerine Complex, a black pepper extract with added ginger that boosts absorption. On top of easy-to-digest soft gels, you can trust the quality standards of all Irwin Natural products. Besides being completed in the USA, all supplements are tested for quality, compliance, and regulations. In fact, they only utilize hemp grown in the United States! Ready to heal your body with plant medicine?
